live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!

55474.summary: Some customers in the Princess Park area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
55474.title: Nov 25 - North Vancouver (Princess Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
